ygData.subject: multimachine crawling
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve added some notes on multimachine crawling to the wiki, here: http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?MultimachineCrawl#practical. It d be great to hear

I've added some notes on multimachine crawling to the wiki, here: 
http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?MultimachineCrawl#practical.  
It'd be great to hear people's feedback on how they think a 'hive of 
heritrices' might coordinate to achieve a large-scale crawl.
Yours,
St.Ack
